name: Space Invaders - Clone
description:
This game was made in order to learn a little more about programming and Unity.

The game has no sound and some features at the moment!

Commands

Left/Right : change direction

SPACE: shoot

Feedback

Feel free to comment what you liked and disliked about the game, and what improvements you think would be nice to add.

Insta : @araujo.mayc

Dev Insta: @amauriidev
